summary: I imagine Loki the type of person who walks only four steps and acts like he sprain something for Thor to carry him. Thor...
body: I imagine Loki the type of person who walks only four steps and acts like he sprain something for Thor to carry him. Thor carries him and once up the stairs , Loki claims he wasn’t hurt at all & just walks away. 😂

summary: ‘The Punisher’ A tribute piece for the show on Netflix that is so good. The pencil sketch next to the inked piece shows you a...
caption:
‘The Punisher’

A tribute piece for the show on Netflix that is so good. The pencil sketch next to the inked piece shows you a bit of my work up for this piece. I really enjoyed the show and the character is so fun. Part of a series I have been working on called “Phases of Distortion’, a variety of sketches and paintings (digital) of people I like or find interesting and just giving them my own little spin on what I see.

Drawn on paper, inked in Clip Studio Paint.

summary: Headcanon you can pry from my cold, dead fingers
body:
Headcanon you can pry from my cold, dead fingers

Mjolnir can be lifted by children. All children. So Thor goes around letting kids hold Mjolnir.

blog.name: frenfics
blog.title: Dissipear Here
blog.description:
{pre-endgame writings for post-endgame pain}

Requests And Taglists Are Open! • Master list

summary: The Happiest Place On Earth  okay but like the avengers at Disney world •just imagine it though •like tony taking the whole...
body:
The Happiest Place On Earth

okay but like the avengers at Disney world

•just imagine it though

•like tony taking the whole group to the different parks

•but like imagine Steve at magic kingdom in frontier land

•he’d be l i v i n g for it because its all old and timey

•but also him at the hall of presidents because patriotism

•he’s force the whole group to go in and watch it with him, because “cmon guys it’s history isn’t that so cool!”

•and Peter would be complaining bc he just wants to go on the roller coasters

•but I really think Steve’s favorite would be the carousel of progress, because it goes though a little of everything he missed.

•but I feel like he wouldn’t be too into the thrill seeker rides, but he would hold everybody else’s bags while they went on

•and tony would be living his best life in Epcot

•cause the first half is all sciency and shit

•he’d be acting unimpressed by it though because a lot of the tech is outdated.

•but he’d remember going there as a kid and being in total awe of all the innovations and wanting to do that when he grew up

•peter would just be having the best of times.

•he probably grew up watching the good age of disney channel. So he’d remember all the ads that would on tv about the parks.

•and he’d always want to go but it just wasn’t ever and option money wise.

•so now he can finally see it all in person and he has a whole little agenda and fast passes and oh my god him and shuri just running around the park going on as many rides as posisbke

•now picture the guardians on all the space themed stuff.

•like all of them being super unimpressed by it

•they’d be on space mountain and peter q would not be having it.

•”what the fuck is this what they really think space is like ew”

•Jesus drax would be so confused “I don’t understand the ships do not drop at unexpected times.” Bc he probably doesn’t know what a spaceship is

•meanwhile Rocket at animal kingdom

•rocket at animal kingdom

•so knowing him, he’d be really angry about all the animals on the safari. He’d spend half of his day trying to just free the zebras and shit

•”why the hell aren’t you guys running?? Go! Be free! Stage a revolution!”

•on the other hand Nat would just being trying all the different alcoholic drinks.

•and then going on as many thrill rides as possible

•and Bruce is super into the world showcase, because it’s calm and just so interesting (in my option at least)

•PETER AGAIN at Hollywood Studios.

•all of the star wars shit omg he’d totally go on star tours over and over again to try and get all the different story lines and different videos.

•and him doing the Jedi training camp even though it’s only for little kids

•and when the storm troopers do their marches down the streets he’d jump right in and join them.

•there’s just so many things he’d do in Disney I cant even

•Thor would be so into the fireworks I can’t

•this big burly guy hanging out in front of the castle for three hours to get the best spot

•because he remembers all the beautiful lights on Asgard and this being the next best thing

•shit I’m crying

•Wanda would be living for fantasy land

•she always used to pretend to be a princess but as she got older with her powers and shit she’d feel like a monster and finally letting herself be a little kid again

•vision not knowing what to do so just trying to have conversations with the animatronics and not getting why they won’t answer him, “because they seem to be an advanced robotic system in a synthetic human shell.” (I just made so much of that shit up idk even know I’m sorry)

•Bucky eating his way through the parks

•Sam eating his was through the parks but complaining because him and Bucky keep ending up at the same restaurants

•t’challa being really into the avatar stuff because pandora kind of parallels wakanda

•both are civilizations hidden from the rest of society

•Clint and Scott bring their kids

•CLINT AND SCOTT BRINGING THEIR KIDS

•something they’ve never been able to do because of their jobs

•I know I’m missing some of them so I’m sorry but Jesus I really love Disney and the avengers and I just my heart

•can this be avengers 4 pls thank you

Masterlist

blog.name: super-hero-confessions
blog.title: Super-Hero-Confessions
blog.description:
Super-hero-confessions is a blog where you can submit your confessions/personal opinions about any of the super hero movies, comics, television shows, cartoons, etc.

The confessions that are posted are those that are submitted; not the opinions of the blog owners. All the confessions will be anonymous when posted. Feel free to submit photos along with your confession if you would like as well.

If you want us to see a post tag it with either #superheroconfessions or #superhero confessions
